metadata.description: Apache Software Foundation projects with CLI tools

apache_cli_tools.name: Kafka
apache_cli_tools.description: Kafka is an open-source distributed event streaming platform used by thousands of companies for high-performance data pipelines, streaming analytics, data integration, and mission-critical applications.

apache_cli_tools.name: Spark
apache_cli_tools.description: Spark is a unified analytics engine for large-scale data processing.

apache_cli_tools.name: Hadoop
apache_cli_tools.description: Distributed computing framework for processing large datasets across clusters using the MapReduce programming model and HDFS storage.
apache_cli_tools.notes: Large image (~1GB compressed). Help command works but may timeout during initial image download.

apache_cli_tools.name: Flink
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache Flink is an open source stream processing framework with powerful stream- and batch-processing capabilities.

apache_cli_tools.name: Hive
apache_cli_tools.description: Data warehouse software that facilitates reading, writing, and managing large datasets in distributed storage using SQL.

apache_cli_tools.name: Cassandra
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache Cassandra is a highly-scalable partitioned row store.

apache_cli_tools.name: Accumulo
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache Accumulo is a sorted, distributed key/value store that provides robust, scalable data storage and retrieval.

apache_cli_tools.name: Couchdb
apache_cli_tools.description: Multi-master sync NoSQL database with an intuitive HTTP/JSON API, designed for reliability and ease of use.

apache_cli_tools.name: Httpd
apache_cli_tools.description: The Apache HTTP Server - world's most popular open-source web server providing secure, efficient, and extensible HTTP services.

apache_cli_tools.name: Tomcat
apache_cli_tools.description: The Apache TomcatÂ® software is an open source implementation of the Jakarta Servlet, Jakarta Pages, Jakarta Expression Language and Jakarta WebSocket technologies.

apache_cli_tools.name: Maven
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool.

apache_cli_tools.name: Ant
apache_cli_tools.description: Ant is a Java based build tool providing in theory it is kind of like "make" without makes wrinkles and with the full portability of pure java code.

apache_cli_tools.name: Gradle
apache_cli_tools.description: Gradle is an open-source build automation tool focused on flexibility and performance - supports Java, Kotlin, Groovy, Scala, C/C++, and more.

apache_cli_tools.name: Skywalking
apache_cli_tools.description: SkyWalking is an open-source APM system that provides monitoring, tracing and diagnosing capabilities for distributed systems in Cloud Native architectures.

apache_cli_tools.name: Zookeeper
apache_cli_tools.description: Centralized service for maintaining configuration information, naming, providing distributed synchronization, and group services for distributed applications.

apache_cli_tools.name: Activemq
apache_cli_tools.description: High-performance message broker supporting multiple protocols and messaging patterns for distributed applications.

apache_cli_tools.name: Pulsar
apache_cli_tools.description: Pulsar is a distributed pub-sub messaging platform with a very flexible messaging model and an intuitive client API.

apache_cli_tools.name: Rocketmq
apache_cli_tools.description: Distributed messaging and streaming platform with low latency, high performance, reliability, and trillion-level capacity.

apache_cli_tools.name: Ozone
apache_cli_tools.description: Ozone is a scalable, redundant, and distributed object store for Hadoop and Cloud-native environments.

apache_cli_tools.name: Bookkeeper
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache BookKeeper is a scalable, fault-tolerant and low latency storage service optimized for append-only workloads.

apache_cli_tools.name: Beam
apache_cli_tools.description: Beam is a unified model for defining both batch and streaming data-parallel processing pipelines, as well as a set of language-specific SDKs for constructing pipelines and Runners for executing them on distributed processing backends, including Apache Flink,.

apache_cli_tools.name: Storm
apache_cli_tools.description: Storm is a distributed realtime computation system.

apache_cli_tools.name: Samza
apache_cli_tools.description: Samza is a distributed stream processing framework.

apache_cli_tools.name: Oozie
apache_cli_tools.description: Oozie is an extensible, scalable and reliable system to define, manage, schedule, and execute complex Hadoop workloads via web services.

apache_cli_tools.name: Solr
apache_cli_tools.description: ----------------------------------- Solr is the blazing-fast, open source, multi-modal search platform built on Apache Lucene.

apache_cli_tools.name: Lucene
apache_cli_tools.description: !Lucene Logo Apache Lucene is a high-performance, full-featured text search engine library written in Java.

apache_cli_tools.name: Arrow
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache Arrow is a universal columnar format and multi-language toolbox for fast data interchange and in-memory analytics.

apache_cli_tools.name: Thrift
apache_cli_tools.description: Thrift is a lightweight, language-independent software stack for point-to-point RPC implementation.

apache_cli_tools.name: Avro
apache_cli_tools.description: Data serialization system providing rich data structures, compact binary format, and schema evolution support.

apache_cli_tools.name: Parquet
apache_cli_tools.description: This repository contains the specification for [Apache Parquet] and [Apache Thrift] definitions to read and write Parquet metadata.

apache_cli_tools.name: Druid
apache_cli_tools.description: Druid is a high performance real-time analytics database.

apache_cli_tools.name: NiFi
apache_cli_tools.description: NiFi is an easy to use, powerful, and reliable system to process and distribute data.

apache_cli_tools.name: Superset
apache_cli_tools.description: Modern data exploration and visualization platform for enterprise business intelligence with an intuitive interface and rich visualizations.

apache_cli_tools.name: Zeppelin
apache_cli_tools.description: Web-based notebook that enables interactive data analytics with multi-language support and visualization capabilities.

apache_cli_tools.name: Pinot
apache_cli_tools.description: Pinot is a real-time distributed OLAP datastore, built to deliver scalable real-time analytics with low latency.

apache_cli_tools.name: IoTDB
apache_cli_tools.description: Time-series database for IoT scenarios with high-throughput data collection, storage, and analysis capabilities.

apache_cli_tools.name: DolphinScheduler
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache DolphinScheduler is a modern data orchestration platform that empowers agile, low-code development of high-performance workflows.

apache_cli_tools.name: Doris
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache Doris is an easy-to-use, high-performance and real-time analytical database based on MPP architecture, known for its extreme speed and ease of use.
apache_cli_tools.notes: Multiple images: fe (Frontend), be (Backend), ms (Meta Service), broker

apache_cli_tools.name: Drill
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache Drill is a distributed MPP query layer that supports SQL and alternative query languages against NoSQL and Hadoop data storage systems.

apache_cli_tools.name: Kyuubi
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache Kyuubiâ¢ is a distributed and multi-tenant gateway to provide serverless SQL on data warehouses and lakehouses.

apache_cli_tools.name: APISIX
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache APISIX is a dynamic, real-time, high-performance API Gateway.

apache_cli_tools.name: ShenYu
apache_cli_tools.description: ShenYu (ç¥ç¦¹) is the honorific name of Chinese ancient monarch Xia Yu (also known in later times as Da Yu), who left behind the touching story of the three times he crossed the Yellow River.
apache_cli_tools.notes: Also available: apache/shenyu-admin for admin console

apache_cli_tools.name: ShardingSphere
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache ShardingSphere is a distributed SQL transaction & query engine that allows for data sharding, scaling, encryption, and more - on any database.

apache_cli_tools.name: Camel
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache Camel is a powerful open source integration framework based on known Enterprise Integration Patterns with powerful Bean Integration.
apache_cli_tools.notes: Camel K is the Kubernetes-native runtime for Camel

apache_cli_tools.name: EventMesh
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache EventMesh is a new generation serverless event middleware for building distributed event-driven applications.

apache_cli_tools.name: SeaTunnel
apache_cli_tools.description: - Why Choose SeaTunnel - Key Features - SeaTunnel Workflow - Supported Connectors - Getting Started - Multimodal Data Integration - Apache SeaTunnel Tools - Use Cases - Code of Conduct - Contributors - How to Compile.

apache_cli_tools.name: Ranger
apache_cli_tools.description: Apache Ranger allows contributions via pull requests (PRs) on GitHub.

apache_cli_tools.name: SkyWalking
apache_cli_tools.description: SkyWalking is an open-source APM system that provides monitoring, tracing and diagnosing capabilities for distributed systems in Cloud Native architectures.

apache_cli_tools.name: Dubbo-Admin
apache_cli_tools.description: A Cloud-Native Microservice Framework Build apps with built-in rpc, traffic management, security, observability support that can deploy on kubernetes and vm.

apache_cli_tools.name: RocketMQ-Dashboard
apache_cli_tools.description: Web-based administration console for Apache RocketMQ, providing visualization and management of topics, consumers, producers, and message traces.

apache_cli_tools.name: APISIX-Dashboard
apache_cli_tools.description: - The master version should be used with Apache APISIX master version.

apache_cli_tools.name: Kudu
apache_cli_tools.description: Columnar storage manager for structured data supporting fast analytics on rapidly changing data.

apache_cli_tools.name: Kylin
apache_cli_tools.description: Open-source distributed analytics engine providing SQL interface and multi-dimensional OLAP analysis on Hadoop for extremely large datasets.

apache_cli_tools.name: HBase
apache_cli_tools.description: NoSQL distributed database built on Hadoop for random, real-time read/write access to big data tables.
apache_cli_tools.notes: Using community-maintained image (official Apache image not available on Docker Hub)

apache_cli_tools.name: IoTDB-Web-Workbench
apache_cli_tools.description: Web-based workbench for Apache IoTDB, providing data visualization, query management, and database administration for time-series data.
apache_cli_tools.notes: Separate frontend and backend images available
